'''v0.11.0 alpha build 13''' is the thirteenth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|v0.11.0]].

== Changes ==
* Readded all tools to the [[Creative]] inventory.

== Fixes ==
'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15326 9 bugs fixed]'''
* Fixed crash on loading chunks too early
* Fixed crash when creating certain entities
* Fixed various language-related issues
* Fixed lighting with entities outside of world bounds

'''From the 0.11.0 beta'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8464}} – Back button on Android navbar doesn't work in Options menu
* {{bug|MCPE-8558}} – Skin pack glitch

'''From the previous development version'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8516}} – Iron shovel missing in Creative
* {{bug|MCPE-8518}} – Casting the fishing rod into water crashes the game immediately
* {{bug|MCPE-8525}} – Fishing in a boat crashes the game</onlyinclude>
